columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name of the secret.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the secret.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The date and time when a secret was created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The user-provided description of the secret.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The ARN or alias of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt the SecretString and SecretBinary fields in each version of the secret.

columns.name: deleted_date
columns.description: The date and time the deletion of the secret occurred.

columns.name: last_accessed_date
columns.description: The last date that this secret was accessed.

columns.name: last_changed_date
columns.description: The last date and time that this secret was modified in any way.

columns.name: last_rotated_date
columns.description: The most recent date and time that the Secrets Manager rotation process was successfully completed.

columns.name: owning_service
columns.description: Returns the name of the service that created the secret.

columns.name: primary_region
columns.description: The Region where Secrets Manager originated the secret.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: A JSON-formatted string that describes the permissions that are associated with the attached secret.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the permissions that are associated with the attached secret in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: replication_status
columns.description: Describes a list of replication status objects as InProgress, Failed or InSync.

columns.name: rotation_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether automatic, scheduled rotation is enabled for this secret.

columns.name: rotation_lambda_arn
columns.description: The ARN of an AWS Lambda function invoked by Secrets Manager to rotate and expire the secret either automatically per the schedule or manually by a call to RotateSecret.

columns.name: rotation_rules
columns.description: A structure that defines the rotation configuration for the secret.

columns.name: secret_versions_to_stages
columns.description: A list of all of the currently assigned SecretVersionStage staging labels and the SecretVersionId attached to each one.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of user-defined tags associated with the secret.
